property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this cells from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ When you put this card from your hand into your mana zone, untap it.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: King Master Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Creation of the Forbidden King

property.name: Type
property.value: King Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/New World Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have the 3 King Cells of "New World King's Authority", "New World King's Thoughts" and "New World King's Fighting Spirit" in your hand or mana zone, you may pay this creature's cost to combine them and summon this King Creature. ■ Extra EX Life (As you put this creature, shieldify the top 2 cards of your deck. When this creature would leave, put one of its shields into your graveyard instead.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {WORLD BREAKER} ■ This creature can't be blocked on the turn you put it. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent discards their hand. ■ Whenever you use "Guard Strike", you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone, then choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

card.name: Sezen the Fumate, Hybrid Super Disaster

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Angel Command/The Answer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each turn, whenever a creature is put for the first time, you may draw a card. ■ Neither player can take an extra turn. ■ Players can't lose except by attacking with creatures.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Creation of the Forbidden King

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Armored Dragon/Demon Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 3000 or less. ■ During your opponent's turn, when this creature's "EX Life" shield leaves your shield zone, tap all cards in your opponent's mana zone. At the start of your opponent's next turn, those cards don't untap.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Creation of the Forbidden King

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Angel Command/Demon Command/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, put up to 2 Distas that cost 6 or less. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ Your opponent's non-multicolored cards cost 2 more to use.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Creation of the Forbidden King

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Jurassic Command Dragon/Zombie Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. You may return that chosen creature to your opponent's hand. Then put a creature that costs the same as or less than that creature from your graveyard. ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature and their ability would trigger, that ability doesn't trigger instead.

If you do, this creature costs 2 less to summon. {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can't be blocked the turn it's put.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put a creature that costs 8 or less from your graveyard. That creature gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your hand or graveyard for no cost. After you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard. ■ At the end of each of your turns, if you cast a spell that turn, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5500 or less, destroy it, then draw a card.

Add up to 2 cards from among them to your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then you may destroy all creatures that have power 6000 or less. ■ At the end of your turn, if 4 or more creatures were destroyed this turn, take an extra turn after this one.
